description: Obtained by destroying crafted items in Dalaran's Obliterum Forge.
name: Obliterum

itemSpells.scaledDescription:
Increases the item level of crafted armor by 5, up to a maximum level of 188. Effectiveness is increased on items below item level 168.



Does not work on items crafted using materials from Argus. Requires 2 Blood of Sargeras. Target item must be soulbound.
